metadata.name: Tomcat WebServer Logs Deleted
metadata.comment: Detects the deletion of tomcat WebServer logs which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 4 AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\tomcat')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\logs\\\\')) AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('catalina.')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('_access_log.')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('localhost.'))))

output.summary: Detects the deletion of tomcat WebServer logs which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. During uninstallation of the tomcat server 2. During log rotation References: Internal Research, https://linuxhint.com/view-tomcat-logs-windows/
